short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to blur videos on YouTube to help minimize distractions and increase productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your YouTube experience into a focused, distraction-free environment with the YouTube Blur Video Extension for Chrome. This powerful tool blurs all content on YouTube except for the search bar and search results, helping students, professionals, and anyone looking to minimize distractions and enhance productivity. Say goodbye to endless scrolling and mindless video watching, and take control of your time and attention.
